rgpd-delete.gdprComplianceIntro: As part of our commitment to respecting your privacy and in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), here is the procedure to follow to request the deletion of your personal data on the Secret Friend platform.
rgpd-delete.deletionStepsIntro: To request the deletion of your data, please follow these steps:
rgpd-delete.emailDeletionRequest: Send us an email at contact@andralude.com from the email address used to create your account on Secret Friend. Your request must clearly indicate your desire for the deletion of your personal data.
rgpd-delete.identityVerification: Attach to your email a proof of identity to confirm that you are indeed the owner of the concerned account. This measure is necessary to prevent any unauthorized action on your account.
rgpd-delete.savedPersonalInfo: Saved personal information: This includes your first name, last name, email, company, gender, hobbies, and profession.
rgpd-delete.sentMessages: Sent messages: All messages you have sent during discussions in the app.
rgpd-delete.importedMedia: Imported documents and media: Profile photos and all attachments that you have imported into the app.
rgpd-delete.identityProofData: Information provided for identity proof: The data you provide as part of your deletion request will also be erased once the process is completed.
rgpd-delete.deletionConfirmation: We commit to performing the deletion of your data within a period of 30 days from the receipt of your complete and validated request. Once the deletion is performed, we will send you a confirmation by email.
